thread.title: Pompeo heckled as he arrives for confirmation hearing

title: Pompeo heckled as he arrives for confirmation hearing
text:
Pompeo heckled as he arrives for confirmation hearing 8:04pm IST - 00:45 
A group of hecklers chanting ''no more war'' greeted President Trump's pick for Secretary of State Mike Pompeo as he arrived at his Senate confirmation hearing on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A group of hecklers chanting "no more war" greeted President Trump's pick for Secretary of State Mike Pompeo as he arrived at his Senate confirmation hearing on Thursday.
